name: StoneDEF
description:
You are joined by magical creatures that will help in the fight against enemies. Under your control there will be a plant that attacks enemies with fire.
The mushroom will help you collect coins that you can use to upgrade or hire a guard to follow you to protect you.
You can upgrade staves to increase their damage or attack speed. Also beware of enemies that will attack you. Also, enemy mushrooms will try to steal your coins to prevent you from getting upgrades.

-Beautiful graphics
-Interesting gameplay
-Improvements
